people.name: Hayley Joyal
people.title: Illustration Lead
people.description: Just when we were comfortable calling ourselves a “software development group” Hayley comes along and not only blows us away with her illustrations, but convinces us to launch a scientific illustration service. Thank you Hayley!

people.name: Ziael Aponte
people.title: Illustrator
people.description: Peers often describe Ziael as being from another planet. When you see his illustration abilities, you will understand why. He previously worked in the dining halls - someone should lose their job for allowing that.

people.name: Taylor Hudak
people.title: Communications Specialist
people.degree: UConn Mathematics; Secondary Math Education (double major)
people.description: Taylor has an absurd GPA, is an incredible photographer, and creates/maintains content on <a href='https://core.uconn.edu' target='_blank'>CORE</a> and <a href='https://ip.uconn.edu' target='_blank'>Innovation Portal</a> like it’s nobody’s business.

people.name: Rob Stolarz
people.title: Web Developer
people.description: Rob holds the honor of being the only non-UConn member of our team. The fact that we were willing to jump through hoops to get him on the UConn payroll speaks volumes about his coding abilities.

people.name: Quinn Vissak
people.title: Web Developer
people.description: Quinn is President of UConn’s ACM chapter, is a CSE Teaching Assistant, and still manages to work with us for 20+ hours/week. Can you say “workaholic”?

people.name: Olivia Crosby
people.title: Designer
people.description: Olivia has already held design internships in Europe and the Far East, is President/Founder of the UConn Good Girls Association, and runs a business selling handmade pottery. We’re very lucky to make it on her resume.

people.name: Mark Cabanero
people.title: Web Developer
people.description: In addition to being a true full-stack developer, Mark wrote a blog entry titled “Multicasting, The FOG, and Imaging Computers”. Need we say more?

people.name: Joey O'Shea
people.title: Web Development Consultant
people.description: Joey and Dan go way back to when Joey was still a teenager with short hair. Now Joey has long hair, and an ever longer web development skillset.

people.name: Jack Leyland
people.title: Communications Specialist
people.description: When he’s not developing content for Squared Labs, Jack is busy leading the Student Managed Fund in the Business School. Our only request is that he remember us when he makes it on the Forbes list.

people.name: Alec Marcus
people.title: Design Lead
people.description: Alec’s ability to design logos and websites is, simply put, ridiculous (as is his motorcycle riding ability). A note to employers: you’d be lucky if Alec chose to work for you.

people.name: Dan Schwartz
people.title: Director
people.description: Dan’s talent is surrounding himself with really really smart, talented, and hard working students who can make him look better than he ought to.

people.name: Courtney Wiley
people.title: Program Manager
people.description: Courtney is our resident scrum master. She also used to scrum for UConn's rugby team. Coincidence? We think not.

people.name: Chioma Ezete
people.title: Web Developer
people.description: We knew Chioma was a good fit when she told us that she developed a cooking app using React over the summer - for fun. She also shares our love for great sushi (and great code).

people.name: Carson Stifel
people.title: Communications Specialist
people.description: Writer for The Odyssey Online, EMT, photographer, athlete, co-founder of a bakery, and moonlights as Disney Princesses at kids' b-day parties. Where do we find these people?

people.name: Buddy
people.title: Moral Support Lead
people.description: Buddy knows the commands for sit, down, stay, leave, and come, so long as treats are provided. Buddy told us to write that he loves Squared Labs (and his owner Taylor).

people.name: Brandon Cheng
people.title: Web Developer Lead
people.description: Brandon is a web wizard. He pretty much eats, sleeps, and drinks computers. Brandon coded 97.34% of <a href='https://granttrails.uconn.edu' target='_blank'> GrantTrails</a> and <a href='https://tip.uconn.edu' target='_blank'>TIP</a>.

people.name: Andi Duro
people.title: Web Developer
people.description: Andi is a freshman, but don’t let that fool you. He can run circles around most web developers. He coded 100% of the site you are currently on… in his sleep.
